title: Trial for suspect in deadly Smith County gang shootout rescheduled
content:
TYLER, TX (KLTV) -
The jury trial for a suspected truck stop shooter has been rescheduled for May 16 at 10 a.m. in Smith County.
D'Mio Ingram is facing a murder charge in the death of 25-year-old Laprida Shears. Shears was killed last August outside Bunny's Truck Stop on Farm to Market 14 and N. Loop 323 in Tyler.
Officers say 70 shots were fired outside the truck stop when an argument broke out between gang members from Longview and Tyler.
Ingram is a documented member of the 2200 12th Street Gang in Longview.
Two other suspects were indicted in connection to the shooting.
